message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $20000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $20000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $18000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to compromise. However, I'm not comfortable going all the way down to $18000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $20000 and $18000, which would be $19000. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but $19000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $18500, but that's as high as I can go. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I understand that $18500 is a stretch for you, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $19000. I'm willing to make a small concession, though. I'll meet you at $18800. What do you think?

I appreciate the concession, Alice, but $18800 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $18500, but that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options

I understand that you're willing to meet me at $18500, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable selling the product at that price. I'll make one more concession. I'll meet you at $18700. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options

I've made a serious offer of $18500, and I'm not willing to go any higher. I think that's a fair price for this product, and I'm not willing to pay any more than that. I'd like to reiterate that I'm willing to meet you at $18500
